author: prbuzz.com
title: Stagecoach Festival Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Stagecoach Festival Tickets for the event at Empire Polo Field in Indio, CA on April 29th to May 1st
text:
Stagecoach Festival tickets are on sale now for the event at Empire Polo Field in Indio, CA on April 28th to May 1st. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Stagecoach Festival fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a wide selection of Stagecoach Festival tickets at affordable prices. The Stagecoach Festival is scheduled to be at Empire Polo Field in Indio, CA on April 29th to May 1st.
Headliners will include Luke Bryan, Carrie Underwood, and Eric Church. Also appearing over the three day festival is Chris Young, The Band Perry, Little Big Town, Sam Hunt, Dustin Lynch, Joe Nichols, Eric Paslay, A Thousand Horses, John Fogerty, Emmylou Harris, Doobie Brothers, Chris Stapleton and many more.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries three-day general admission passes, Corral Standing Pit (a standing-room-only section in front of the main stage) or Corral Reserved Seating that includes VIP access to the saloon.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for Stagecoach Festival concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
There isn't an event you will see this year that has the same exciting atmosphere as a live Stagecoach Festival concert.
CapitalCityTickets.com already offers slashed ticket prices on all their ticket inventory. You can save an additional percentage off by using promo code provided.
